mapper.select: SELECT sum(if (f.praise_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.CollectionStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, avg(r.`cnt`) as readCount FROM read_count as r left join user_foot as f on f.document_id = r.document_id and f.document_type = r.document_type WHERE r.document_type = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND r.document_id = #{articleId}

SELECT sum(if (f.praise_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.CollectionStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount FROM user_foot as f WHERE f.document_type = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND f.document_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sum(r.`cnt`) as readCount FROM article a left join read_count as r on a.id = r.document_id WHERE r.document_type = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT `document_id` FROM user_foot WHERE user_id = #{userId} and document_type = 1 and collection_stat = 1 order by update_time desc
limit #{pageParam.offset}, #{pageParam.limit}

SELECT `document_id` FROM user_foot WHERE user_id = #{userId} and document_type = 1 and read_stat = 1 order by update_time desc
limit #{pageParam.offset}, #{pageParam.limit}

SELECT sum(if (f.praise_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.CollectionStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, sum(if (f.read_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.ReadStatEnum@READ.code}, 1, 0)) as readCount, sum(if (f.comment_stat =${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.CommentStatEnum@COMMENT.code}, 1, 0)) as commentCount FROM user_foot as f
